page.title: 05BISHOPSTON
page.content: I live in{Bishopston.}It is quiet and many people live there.{Bishopston has many shops and 3 schools. I go to the{Comprehensive.}It has five years. In the first year you are 12 and in the fifth year you are 16. 900 children go to the comprehensive. They come from areas with Junior schools but not Comprehensive schools. {Mayals, Pennard, Three Crosses, Newton {and Knelston,}of course{Bishopston children all go to the Comprehensive. In each year of the school there are 6 classes (BISHOP) for example in the first year there are classes 1B, 1I, 1S, 1H, 1O and 1P. {Bishopston}is a nice place. We have many beaches.{Brandy Cove,}where smugglers used to smuggle{BRANDY.}We also have a beach called{Pwll Du}which is a beach with mountains of pebbles. JOANNA COLLINS 2B
